entries.journal_entry_description: Help Gallura Handerin with whatever tasks she asks of you.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Speak with Gallura Handerin in the Coronet capitol building. She is Pol Handerin's cousin and has agreed to find you some government work.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Check the Government Drop Boxes in Coronet. There are 10 of them throughout the city, but Gallura has only asked that you check 7 of them. They tend to be located near important buildings.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Gallura Handerin in the Coronet capitol building.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Some thieves have stolen some Imperial Stormtrooper armor from the capitol building. Recover that armor.
entries.task03_waypoint_name: Armor Thieves Seen in this Area
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Gallura Handerin in the Coronet capitol building.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Find the missing government courier and, if necessary, recover the papers he was carrying. He was last seen near the guildhall that used to be a theater.
entries.task06_comm_message_text: As you must now know, your courier has failed to deliver these government documents. If you wish to get them back, you must bring me 1,000,000 credits. I await your response.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Preens B'oola's message: "As you must now know, your courier has been failed to deliver these government documents. If you wish to get them back, you must bring me 1,000,000 credits. I awaiting your response."
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Get the government papers that Preens B'oola took from the courier. Use any means necessary other than paying the ransom he has demanded.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Return to Gallura Handerin in the Coronet capitol building. Tell her you found the courier and were able to recover the papers.
